scenes.description: Explaining the decision process might help, but what if people are still unhappy?

options.text: We'll handle it case by case and address concerns individually.
options.analysis: You showed understanding of individual concerns, demonstrating good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: If we listen to feedback and make adjustments, it could work out.
options.analysis: You suggested a flexible approach by considering feedback, showing good self-regulation and social skills but moderate perception and empathy.

options.text: We can't always please everyone, but we should remain transparent.
options.analysis: You emphasized transparency despite potential dissatisfaction, showing good social skills and motivation but lower empathy.
